sourcesContent: onMounted(() => { // 监听滚动事件，改变导航栏样式 window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { const header = document.getElementById('header'); if (window.scrollY > 50) { header.classList.add('shadow-medium'); header.classList.remove('shadow-soft'); } else { header.classList.remove('shadow-medium'); header.classList.add('shadow-soft'); } }); });
